title: New: Superheart – After Midnight
body:
Fell completely head over heels for the dreamy debut track from London’s **Superheart** which dropped last year, and he’s now followed it up with the equally blissful _After Midnight_.

Again feeling gloriously 80’s indebted, this is romantic, nostalgic pop at its most divine and transcendent. Stick this on and fall in love to and with it.

Again feeling gloriously 80’s indebted, this is romantic, nostalgic pop at its most divine and transcendent. Stick this on and fall in love to and with \[…\]
